CustomField.description: With this Configuration you're able to add different Screen-Pop Types. You can configure if a Screen-Pop gets triggered based on the channel, the direction and the event on an item. Some Directions and Events are only available for the Voice channel.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: With this Configuration you're able to add different Screen-Pop Types. You can configure if a Screen-Pop gets triggered based on the channel, the direction and the event on an item. Some Directions and Events are only available for the Voice channel.
CustomField.label: Screen Pop for Call Events
